assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Fuso Chemical Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells life science, electronic material, and functional chemical products worldwide. Its life science products include malic acid and derivatives, citric acid and derivatives, L-tartaric acid and derivatives, lactic acid and derivatives, gluconic acid and derivatives, other acid derivatives, ascorbic and isoascorbic acids, and amino acid and derivatives, as well as water soluble rust proof agents/water soluble grinding and cutting fluids. The company also provides electronic material products that comprise ultra-high purity colloidal silica and high purity organo silica sol; and functional chemical products that consist of oxidation products, as well as benzoic acid derivatives. It also exports its products. Fuso Chemical Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1952 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.
